[i]Portal 2[/i] is the same as [i]Portal[/i], but worse.
The gameplay is the exact same, with a few new gimmicks. This is fine, as the first game was perfectly acceptable.

It is impossible to change fov. This is unacceptable in any first person game, especially disappointing considering you could in the first game.
At least one of the puzzles has a softlock, forcing you to reload. It's not hard to do, either. 
Additionally quite a few of the puzzles are obtuse, with solutions so ridiculous it's surprising anyone could beat them without a guide.

The ending is amazing however, unlike the first game.
Amazing game and I like the story. The test chambers were hard and can be very challenging but overall their really fun to solve. This is a game that I highly recommend you play.

Apesar do jogo ter sido lançado em 2011, ele continua sendo incrível e altamente inovador. A história e ambientação são muito bem construídas, assim como a sua jogabilidade marcante. Não é a toa que ele é muito conhecido mesmo nos dias de hoje.
Great, immersive sequel that skillfully expands the world.
smart mechanics and well-designed puzzle-platformer levels. loved the atmosphere of the abandoned dystopian laboratory and the voice acting. enjoyed hours of this game solo and multiplayer.
It's one of the best games I've played the only problem is Valve doesn't know how to count to 3

Хорошая игра. Мы с близким человеком играли в коопе. Очень увлекательно. Теперь есть хорошие воспоминания о былом. Так что если есть с кем - вперёд и с песней. 
Основного сюжета игра так же хороша. Сама ч её проходила очень давно и не полностью, загадки хороши, разминают сознание. Во всех аспектах отличная, уникальная игра.
P. S. Гладос тварь.

So like...the first game was interesting. The portal mechanic was clever and the villain was fairly interesting, so it was good. Portal 2? Those same mechanics, a familiar world turned to rot and decay, with a story that is both smart and sad while being really funny. It's so hard to find any flaw in this. It's an amazing game, not much more to say.
I would suggest playing this game indeed okay bye
It's portal! just play it already
